channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Download Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Download Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-24773|2024-08-03T19:42:16.966Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20download%20manager
item.description: The WordPress Download Manager WordPress plugin before 3.2.16 does not escape some of the Download settings when outputting them, allowing high privilege users to perform XSS attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed

item.title: CVE-2021-24969|2024-08-03T19:49:14.022Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20download%20manager
item.description: The WordPress Download Manager WordPress plugin before 3.2.22 does not sanitise and escape Template data before outputting it in various pages (such as admin dashboard and frontend). Due to the lack of authorisation and CSRF checks in the wpdm_save_template AJAX action, any authenticated users such as subscriber is able to call it and perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks
